examples.example: 通过自己的不懈努力，他的成绩有了显著的提升。

translate.english: Through his unremitting efforts, his grades have been significantly improved.

examples.example: 他一直勤奋学习，所以这次考试取得了非常优异的成绩。

translate.english: He has been studying diligently, so he achieved extremely excellent results in this exam.

examples.example: 他凭借着自己的努力，让成绩一直保持在优秀的水平。

translate.english: He, by virtue of his own efforts, keeps his grades at an excellent level all the time.
